verses.verse: Now these <WH428> are [the records of] the generations <WH8435> of Shem, <WH8035> Ham, <WH2526> and Japheth, <WH3315> the sons <WH1121> of Noah; <WH5146> and sons <WH1121> were born <WH3205> to them after <WH310> the flood. <WH3999>
The sons <WH1121> of Japheth <WH3315> [were] Gomer <WH1586> and Magog <WH4031> and Madai <WH4074> and Javan <WH3120> and Tubal <WH8422> and Meshech <WH4902> and Tiras. <WH8494>
And the sons <WH1121> of Gomer <WH1586> [were] Ashkenaz <WH813> and Riphath <WH7384> and Togarmah. <WH8425>
And the sons <WH1121> of Javan <WH3120> [were] Elishah <WH473> and Tarshish, <WH8659> Kittim <WH3794> and Dodanim. <WH1721>

From these <WH428> the coastlands <WH339> of the nations <WH1471> were separated <WH6504> into their lands, <WH776> every <WH376> one <WH376> according to his language, <WH3956> according to their families, <WH4940> into their nations. <WH1471>
And the sons <WH1121> of Ham <WH2526> [were] Cush <WH3568> and Mizraim <WH4714> and Put <WH6316> and Canaan. <WH3667>

And the sons <WH1121> of Cush <WH3568> [were] Seba <WH5434> and Havilah <WH2341> and Sabtah <WH5454> and Raamah <WH7484> and Sabteca; <WH5455> and the sons <WH1121> of Raamah <WH7484> [were] Sheba <WH7614> and Dedan. <WH1719>
Now Cush <WH3568> became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Nimrod; <WH5248> he became <WH2490> <WH1961> a mighty <WH1368> one <WH1368> on the earth. <WH776>

He was a mighty <WH1368> hunter <WH6718> before <WH6440> the Lord; <WH3068> therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> it is said, <WH559> "Like Nimrod <WH5248> a mighty <WH1368> hunter <WH6718> before <WH6440> the Lord. <WH3068>"
And the beginning <WH7225> of his kingdom <WH4467> was Babel <WH894> and Erech <WH751> and Accad <WH390> and Calneh, <WH3641> in the land <WH776> of Shinar. <WH8152>
From that land <WH776> he went <WH3318> forth <WH3318> into Assyria, <WH804> and built <WH1129> Nineveh <WH5210> and Rehoboth-Ir and Calah, <WH3625>
and Resen <WH7449> between <WH996> Nineveh <WH5210> and Calah; <WH3625> that is the great <WH1419> city. <WH5892>
And Mizraim <WH4714> became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Ludim <WH3866> and Anamim <WH6047> and Lehabim <WH3853> and Naphtuhim <WH5320>
and Pathrusim <WH6625> and Casluhim <WH3695> (from which <WH834> came <WH3318> the Philistines <WH6430>) and Caphtorim. <WH3732>
And Canaan <WH3667> became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Sidon, <WH6721> his first-born, and Heth <WH2845>
and the Jebusite <WH2983> and the Amorite <WH567> and the Girgashite <WH1622>
and the Hivite <WH2340> and the Arkite <WH6208> and the Sinite <WH5513>
and the Arvadite <WH721> and the Zemarite <WH6786> and the Hamathite; <WH2577> and afterward <WH310> the families <WH4940> of the Canaanite <WH3669> were spread <WH6327> abroad.

And the territory <WH1366> of the Canaanite <WH3669> extended <WH1961> from Sidon <WH6721> as you go <WH935> toward Gerar, <WH1642> as far <WH5704> as Gaza; <WH5804> as you go <WH935> toward Sodom <WH5467> and Gomorrah <WH6017> and Admah <WH126> and Zeboiim, <WH6636> as far <WH5704> as Lasha. <WH3962>
These <WH428> are the sons <WH1121> of Ham, <WH2526> according to their families, <WH4940> according to their languages, <WH3956> by their lands, <WH776> by their nations. <WH1471>
And also <WH1571> to Shem, <WH8035> the father of all <WH1> the children <WH3605> of Eber, <WH1121> [and] the older <WH5677> brother <WH1419> of Japheth, <WH251> children were born. <WH3315>
The sons <WH1121> of Shem <WH8035> [were] Elam <WH5867> and Asshur <WH804> and Arpachshad <WH775> and Lud <WH3865> and Aram. <WH758>
And the sons <WH1121> of Aram <WH758> [were] Uz <WH5780> and Hul <WH2343> and Gether <WH1666> and Mash. <WH4851>
And Arpachshad <WH775> became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Shelah; <WH7974> and Shelah <WH7974> became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Eber. <WH5677>

And two <WH8147> sons <WH1121> were born <WH3205> to Eber; <WH5677> the name <WH8034> of the one <WH259> [was] Peleg, <WH6389> for in his days <WH3117> the earth <WH776> was divided; <WH6385> and his brother's name <WH8034> [was] Joktan. <WH3355>
And Joktan <WH3355> became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Almodad <WH486> and Sheleph <WH8026> and Hazarmaveth <WH2700> and Jerah <WH3392>
and Hadoram <WH1913> and Uzal <WH187> and Diklah <WH1853>
and Obal <WH5745> and Abimael <WH39> and Sheba <WH7614>
and Ophir <WH211> and Havilah <WH2341> and Jobab; <WH3103> all <WH3605> these <WH428> were the sons <WH1121> of Joktan. <WH3355>
Now their settlement <WH4186> extended <WH1961> from Mesha <WH4852> as you go <WH935> toward Sephar, <WH5611> the hill <WH2022> country <WH2022> of the east. <WH6924>
These <WH428> are the sons <WH1121> of Shem, <WH8035> according to their families, <WH4940> according to their languages, <WH3956> by their lands, <WH776> according to their nations. <WH1471>

These <WH428> are the families <WH4940> of the sons <WH1121> of Noah, <WH5146> according to their genealogies, <WH8435> by their nations; <WH1471> and out of these <WH428> the nations <WH1471> were separated <WH6504> on the earth <WH776> after <WH310> the flood. <WH3999>
